location: Nusa Idaman Business Center - Iskandar Puteri

showroom.address: Lot 1, No.1 Jalan Laksamana 1, Puteri Harbour, 79250 Iskandar Puteri Johor, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.00pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 9.30am to 5.00pm

description: Spacious 3-storey shop offices, ranging from 6,204 to 9,492 sq. ft., are located on freehold land in the charming suburb of Nusa Idaman. Businesses here benefit from a captive market within the Nusa Idaman community, as well as the adjacent bustling Bukit Indah township.
